short_summary: Stewart Small Craft Harbour Approach Replacement
description: This is the Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Invitation to Qualify: Phase Two - F1571-230371
### Details of the Tender
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4232298848
* **Title:** Phase Two - F1571-230371 - DFO - Stewart Small Craft Harbour Approach Replacement - Stewart, BC
* **Description:** Invitation to Qualify for Phase Two of the F1571-230371 project. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid for this procurement.
* **Notice Published:** October 26, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 10, 2023, at 14:00:00 (local time)

### Procurement Details
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) - 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### End User and Tender Contact Information
* **End User:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) - 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E6, Canada
* **Contact Person:** Brandie Klyne (SPAC/PSPC) - brandie.klyne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
### Note 
* This tender invitation has expired.
